title: Google\Cloud\Firestore\V1\Precondition
name: Precondition
description:
A precondition on a document, used for conditional operations.

Generated from protobuf message google.firestore.v1.Precondition

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.exists
params.description: When set to true, the target document must exist. When set to false, the target document must not exist.

params.name: data.update_time
params.description: When set, the target document must exist and have been last updated at that time. Timestamp must be microsecond aligned.

methods.description:
